summary: Christoffer and Maja's trip to Prague to bring back Chistoffer's deceased father evolves into the story of a break-up. In the wake of the events that follow, secrets gradually emerge which threaten to destroy their marriage.
cast: Mads Mikkelsen|Stine Stengade|Borivoj Navrátil|Jana Plodková|Josef Vajnar|Veronika Arichteva|Milan Duchek|Martin Dusbaba|Thomas W. Gabrielsson|Radim Kalvoda|Nicola Meisselová|Irena Orosová|Michal Rones|Anna Veselá|Lucia Vráblicová|Christian Heldbo Wienberg|Edita Zákravská
title: Prag
